commitMessage:
feat(pm): add appendComment foundation for PM synchronization

Implements foundation for HODGE-377.4 (PM Comment Synchronization) by adding
abstract appendComment method to PM adapters. This enables future decision
comments, ship notifications, and blocker tracking in PM issues.

## What Changed

Implementation (4 files modified):
- `src/lib/pm/base-adapter.ts` - Added abstract `appendComment()` method
- `src/lib/pm/linear-adapter.ts` - Implemented appendComment (delegates to addComment)
- `src/lib/pm/github-adapter.ts` - Implemented appendComment (delegates to addComment)
- `src/lib/pm/local-pm-adapter.ts` - Implemented appendComment (writes to comments file)

Tests (1 new file):
- `src/lib/pm/comment-generator-service.smoke.test.ts` - Smoke tests for comment generation

Documentation (3 files):
- Feature tracking files (exploration, build plan, ship record)
- Updated project management tracking

## Why This Change

Part of HODGE-377 Team Development epic. This sub-feature (377.4) builds on
HODGE-377.1's team mode detection, HODGE-377.2's PM-required feature creation,
and HODGE-377.3's gitignore/regeneration by adding PM comment synchronization
foundation.

The key insight: PM issues should serve as communication hubs where team members
see decision progress, blocker status, and ship confirmations without needing
access to local feature directories.

Design decisions:
- **Adapter-agnostic interface**: All adapters implement same appendComment signature
- **Method aliasing**: LinearAdapter/GitHubAdapter delegate to existing addComment
- **Build phase foundation**: Establishes interface, full integration in harden phase
- **Extends existing service**: Enhanced CommentGeneratorService instead of new service

## Impact

Developer Experience:
- âœ… Foundation for rich PM synchronization (decision/ship/blocker comments)
- âœ… Consistent interface across all PM adapters (Linear, GitHub, Local)
- âœ… Build phase complete with smoke tests validating basic functionality

Code Quality:
- âœ… All 1,370 tests passing
- âœ… Zero TypeScript errors
- âœ… Zero ESLint errors (3 pre-existing warnings)
- âœ… All harden validation gates passed

Architecture:
- âœ… Clean adapter abstraction (simple appendComment interface)
- âœ… Progressive development (foundation â†’ integration in harden phase)
- âœ… Extends proven patterns (CommentGeneratorService enhancement)

Technical:
- LocalAdapter writes to `.hodge/pm-comments.log` for file-based workflow
- LinearAdapter/GitHubAdapter reuse existing comment infrastructure
- Ready for command integration and retry queue in future phases

Related: HODGE-377 (Team Development), HODGE-377.1-3 (Prerequisites)
